item.title: Clanker Might Be the New N Word.
item.content:encoded: Economic anxiety is real, and people bond over shared fears. But we don't have to normalize slurs to do it—even if we totally get why people are reaching for them.

item.title: Why I'm Breaking Up With Microsoft (And You Should Too)
